revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Atheros |model=AR5BAP-00030 |revision= |fcc_date=11/07/2001 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=reference design |type=access point |fcc_id=PPD-AR5BAP-00030, LNQ802AA, HEDACCWA5001 |pwr_v=3.3 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Motorola |cpu1_model=MPC8245;XPC8245LZU266A; |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=E28F640J3A-120 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC2M32B2 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, DE-9,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5210A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5110 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=a |wi1_ant_conn=MMCX |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=National Semiconductor |eth_chip1_model=DP83815 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=VxWorks |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=a |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass=5up |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|802.11a Wireless Access Point}}
This device is assumed to use DP83815 and have 16MB RAM like :the [[SMC SMC2755W]] (a device using this reference design).
The sample SSID is also indicated as ''Atheros 802.11a AP'' :w/ 00:03:7F OUI (''[[Atheros]]''). The FCC user guide indicates that this device uses ''VxWorks''.
The default credentials for this entry are from the FCC manual.
